title: Italian Wikipedia
summary: The Italian Wikipedia (Italian: Wikipedia in italiano) is the Italian-language edition of Wikipedia. This edition was created on May 11, 2001[1] and first edited on June 11, 2001. As of December 4, 2021, it has 1,728,874 articles and more than 2,191,561 registered accounts.[2] It is the 8th-largest Wikipedia by the number of articles (after the English, Swedish, German, Dutch, French, Cebuano, and Russian editions).[3]
